attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The police service is in need of reform.

We are calling for a true "policing by public consent" culture to be established and nurtured for the benefit of both the public and "genuine" police officers trying to do their jobs.

We are requesting that full public and front line police consultations take place and steps taken to stamp out bullying, violence, and false representation within the police service with a return to officers acting with Honesty, Integrity and Impartiality during the course of their duties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
